title: We Must Get Away From Them (Ep 1825)
description:
In this episode, I address the massive tax hike the Democrats move through the Senate this weekend, and its devastating impacts on you. 
I also discuss the latest Hunter Biden grenade to go off. 

News Picks:


The Grasshopper Elite and Its Enemy.


Kevin McCarthy Drops the Hammer on 51 Former Intel Officials Who Signed Hunter Biden Letter.

Conservatives are moving away from liberals. 


VP Joe Biden met with two Chinese energy execs in the West Wing.


School districts sour on mask mandates amid legal scrutiny, research questioning effectiveness.

The Dems scrapped their COVID hysteria in order to pass their tax hiking bill.

The IRS may be coming after you next.
